author: Anonymous Atom
title: Question for Instructors
question: Recently got sick.  I have a sore throat and cough.  I'm expecting to miss the midterm tomorrow unless my symptoms go away so in case I have covid so I don't give it to anyone.    Wondering what would happen if I get excused?  Is there an alternative formate of writing it or something?
instructor_answer: Let Emily, the course coordinator, know at cpsc110-admin@cs.ubc.ca
